Param.Label: elementCode
Param.Description: The user must specify which element code should be analyzed in this time series.

Param.Label: Mean Test
Param.Description: Should a test be performed that labels values as problematic if they are 3 standard deviations from the mean? Note: robust estimators are used for the mean and standard deviation, as outliers may be present in the data.

Param.Label: Regression Test
Param.Description: Should a test be performed that fits a linear regression model to the data (estimating the value as a function of time) and labels values as problematic if they are 3 standard deviations from the expected value? Note: robust estimators are used for the mean and standard deviation, as outliers may be present in the data.

Param.Label: Ratio Test
Param.Description: Should a test be performed that computes the ratio of the value from one year to the next and labels values as outliers if that ratio exceeds 3 standard deviations from the mean?

Param.Label: Minimum Value
Param.Description: If a value is specified, then an additional test is performed to check if each value is within the minimum and maximum value.

Param.Label: Maximum Value
Param.Description: If a value is specified, then an additional test is performed to check if each value is within the minimum and maximum value.
